ISSUE.TITLE: An "Edit" button doesn't work on the specification attributes page
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 develop Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Go to the specification attributes page 2. See the "Edit" button beside the Default group 3. Click this button 4. See that nothing happens ![cfa06c08f8](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16681184/100599861-9b6cee00-3311-11eb-8a70-98349f0a16ce.jpg)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #1730 Changed the names of some methods
